apple_vendor_description: This tender representation on Apple devices features a loving couple, a woman with medium skin tone and a man with medium-light skin tone, embracing closely with a prominent, glowing heart floating between them. Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients lend a sense of warmth and depth to their figures, while the heart shines with a radiant, affectionate glow. The emoji beautifully symbolizes romance, partnership, and strong emotional bonds, perfect for celebrating relationships.
